Room.Name: Gnarled Oak Valley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a wonderfully charming valley, filled with ancient oaks.
Room.LongDescription: The path seems well worn, but also well maintained. Wildflowers grow in neat borders along the way. Looking west you see that the path splits and takes a southern route and also a northern one. Both paths seem equally well taken care of. Great oaks make a dense woods in that direction, and you see small homes cut into some of them.
